name: Crazy Kanorun
description:
This is an offline game ran quite interesting, because the players have to face obstacles and be able to achieve the target to run at that level to continue to the next level. Players can use the stance / dazzling skill to complete a level in the game.



Feature Game
-Design Game interesting
-Short Comic
-Riveting Skill
-Simple Game Play
-Endless mode
-Can be played Offline



And more feature, Try this and share with your friends how far you can run.

visit our web:www.indkreat.com

Indkreat
